title: Update public front page with Vijaya Children's Clinic branding from uploaded images

requirements.text: Extract and use the Vijaya Children's Clinic logo from IMG-20260221-WA0006.jpg as the website logo throughout the application, replacing any existing placeholder logos

quotes: Change the logo of the website with the above image

acceptanceCriteria: The clinic logo (cyan/green heart with figures design) is extracted from the uploaded image
The logo is displayed in the site header
The logo appears on the landing page hero section
The logo maintains proper aspect ratio and quality

requirements.text: Apply the color scheme from the uploaded images throughout the public-facing sections: use cyan (#00BCD4), green (#4CAF50), and blue (#2196F3) gradients matching the clinic's branding materials

quotes: also the colour of the website

acceptanceCriteria: Primary colors match the cyan/green/blue palette from the uploaded branding images
Gradients are applied to hero sections and backgrounds consistent with the clinic's visual identity
Color updates are limited to public-facing pages only
Staff portal retains its existing color scheme

requirements.text: Update the landing page to prominently display all clinic information visible in IMG-20260221-WA0006.jpg: doctor's name (Dr. K. Manicka Vinayagar M.B.B.S, M.D), credentials (Consultant Paediatrician - New Born and Child Specialist), registration number (Reg.No: 152853), services with icons (Newborn Care, Vaccination, Fever, Nebulization, Growth Monitoring), contact number (93637 16343), clinic timings (Mon to Sat 7 PM to 9 PM, Sundays on appointment), and address (No.1, 1st street, Balaji Nagar, Anakaputhur, Chennai - 600 070)

quotes: Based on this two images above, Use the details to complete the website
Keep the staff portal. Needed changes in the front page that is the public facing section.

acceptanceCriteria: Doctor's full credentials are displayed with proper formatting
All five services are shown with colorful circular icons matching the uploaded image design
Contact information is prominently displayed and easily accessible
Clinic timings are clearly visible
Complete address is displayed
Layout matches the professional medical clinic aesthetic from the branding images

requirements.text: Display the Tamil tagline 'குழந்தை நலனே எங்கள் முதன்மை' (Child welfare is our priority) and English tagline 'Growing Healthy Futures' on the landing page as shown in the uploaded branding images

quotes: Based on this two images above, Use the details to complete the website

acceptanceCriteria: Tamil tagline is displayed with proper Unicode rendering
English tagline 'Growing Healthy Futures' is prominently shown
Both taglines use appropriate typography matching the clinic's gentle, caring brand identity

requirements.text: Preserve all existing staff portal functionality including appointment management, authentication, date filtering, search capabilities, and status updates while applying the branding updates only to public-facing pages

quotes: Keep the staff portal. Needed changes in the front page that is the public facing section.

acceptanceCriteria: Staff login and authentication continues to work without modification
Appointment list, filtering, and search remain functional
Appointment status updates work as before
Role-based access control is preserved
No backend changes are made to appointment or user profile logic

constraints: Do not modify backend logic or data models
Do not change the staff portal's existing functionality or authentication flow
Preserve all existing appointment management features
Apply branding updates only to public-facing sections (landing page, booking page, footer)
nonGoals: Changing the staff portal's user interface or color scheme
Adding new pages or sections beyond updating existing public pages

required: Vijaya Children's Clinic logo with cyan and green heart design containing two figures and stars, extracted from the uploaded branding image (vijaya-logo.dim_200x200.png)
Newborn care icon - circular illustration of a baby in cyan color on white background (service-newborn.dim_120x120.png)
Vaccination icon - circular illustration of a syringe with sparkles in orange color on white background (service-vaccination.dim_120x120.png)
Fever icon - circular illustration of a child with thermometer in green color on white background (service-fever.dim_120x120.png)
Nebulization icon - circular illustration of nebulizer equipment in cyan color on white background (service-nebulization.dim_120x120.png)
Growth monitoring icon - circular illustration of a child with growth chart in pink color on white background (service-growth.dim_120x120.png)
